title: Swordplay
description: Book 1 in the Alidomn series. When Claire discovers a long lost necklace belonging to a princess in another world, she is hurled into a chaos she cannot understand. The Kingdom of Alidomn has been turned upside down by war, brought on by the evil and powerful Loutana. She finds herself surrounded by dragons, giants, magicians and beasts, but amidst the war that rages can she also find true love?
author: Margaret Elizabeth O'Neil
